synopsis.text:
Shy and introverted, Fumi Manjoume, a book-loving girl, is starting her first year at Matsuoka Girls' High School with a broken heart. After a decade apart, she reunites with her childhood best friend, Akira Okudaira, who is now attending Fujigatani Girls' Academy. As they navigate their new high school lives, they face their own romantic challenges and help each other through them.

Fumi, who often seeks solace in Akira's company, finds herself in the spotlight when popular senior Yasuko Sugimoto takes a special interest in her. As Fumi grapples with her identity and tries to step out of the shadows, Akira yearns for their friendship to return to its former glory.

Set in the beautiful city of Kamakura, this delicate tale of love and friendship unfolds as Fumi and Akira juggle school, social life, and the complexities of their feelings. As Fumi finds herself torn between her deep bond with Akira and her budding romance with Sugimoto, she must navigate the intricate dance of adolescence, love, and self-discovery. Will their friendship survive the trials of high school, or will it succumb to the pressures of growing up?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
